Login with Facebook Submit a wedding REAL WEDDINGS WEDDING IDEAS FILMS CERTIFIED VENDORS VENDOR GUIDE GALLERY THE MAGAZINE Welcome to Maharani Weddings At Maharani Weddings, we believe that every bride deserves the fairytale wedding of her dreams! Here at MaharaniWeddings.com you will find glittering seeds of inspiration for every aspect of your upcoming wedding. In addition to profiling some of the most spectacular Indian weddings from around the globe through interviews, pictures, and videos, we also hand-pick and share a list of the best Indian wedding vendors in our Maharani Weddings Platinum Guide. From event planners to photographers, dj's
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | , florists, cinematographers, makeup artists, mehndi artists, you name it... you’ll find connections to every resource you could ever need for all your wedding ceremonies and celebrations. Voorhees, NJ Indian Wedding by Saroj Studios October 6, 2025 Posted by: Shawna Comments Love and unforgettable moments, Shruti & Stephen’s wedding is live on the Platinum Guide Blog ! Tap our Platinum Guide to start crafting a celebration that’s unmistakably, joyfully yours. COMMENT: FAVORITE: SHARE: TWEET: PIN: Anaheim, CA Indian Wedding by White Rose Production Cinema and Photo October 3, 2025 Posted by: Shawna Comments Some wedding films make you smile; Jinal & Jigar’s make you want to stand up and cheer. From the first frame, White Rose Production Cinema and Photo —our trusted Maharani Weddings Platinum Guide member—builds a rhythm that feels like California sunshine set to a dhol beat. The edit glides from a joy-charged sangeet at the JW Marriott Anaheim Resort to a heart-full ceremony and a let’s-never-go-home reception, stitching together happy chaos and quiet tend
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | erness with seamless pacing, clean natural audio, and those just-right reaction shots that turn a pretty video into a love story. EventSpell keeps the weekend moving with “how is this so smooth?” logistics, while JNJ Florals layers romantic texture into every scene so the spaces look lush from any angle. Dolled Up by Lulu delivers camera-ready glam that holds from first look to last dance, Fusion Sounds LA fires up a wall-to-wall dance floor, and Lin & Jirsa Photography’s editorial stills echo the film’s polish—proof that this vendor team speaks the same cinematic language. What makes this highlight sing is intention. You feel it in the way White Rose Production Cinema and Photo frames stolen glances, in the cut that lands perfectly on a drum hit, in the ceremony sequences that breathe lon
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | g enough for meaning to settle. There’s wit too—a playful transition here, a parents-trying-not-to-cry close-up there—so the film moves like a great conversation: heartfelt, clever, and absolutely alive. If you’re hunting for a cinematographer who understands South Asian timelines, cultural beats, and how to make your moments feel epic without ever feeling staged, White Rose Production is that partner. Press play on the highlight, save your favorite frames, and imagine your own vows in that light. Then tap our Platinum Guide to connect with a dream team of vendors—and start crafting a film that looks as good as your love feels. Follow @maharaniweddings for daily inspo, vendor spotlights, and real-wedding ideas. STYLE GUIDE style Traditional Romantic Contemporary season Summer color Cinemat
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | ography: White Rose Production Cinema and Photo | Venue: JW Marriott Anaheim Resort | Planning & Design: EventSpell | Floral & Decor: JNJ Florals | Hair & Makeup: Dolled Up by Lulu | DJ: Fusion Sounds LA | Photography: Lin & Jirsa Photography White Rose Production Cinema and Photo is a member of the Platinum Guide. Love what you see? Explore their portfolios. White Rose Production Cinema and Photo VIEW PORTFOLIO For more information on how Platinum Guide members are chosen, click here. COMMENT: FAVORITE: SHARE: TWEET: PIN: Saint Kate – The Arts Hotel: Where Weddings Become Works of Art October 2, 2025 Posted by: Shawna Comments Every couple deserves a wedding that feels as extraordinary as their love story. At Saint Kate – The Arts Hotel , part of Marcus Hotels & Resorts and a Maharani Wed
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | dings Certified Venue , your wedding becomes more than a celebration — it becomes a masterpiece. Recognized as one of Milwaukee’s most esteemed hotels, Saint Kate is a cultural landmark that embraces art in every form. From the moment your guests arrive, they’re immersed in an atmosphere inspired by music, painting, sculpture, and design. Located in Milwaukee’s Theater District, this creative hub combines luxury with imagination, giving couples the chance to host a wedding that’s as vibrant and unforgettable as their traditions. The Art of the Wedding Experience At Saint Kate , the wedding journey flows seamlessly. Host your bridal shower, rehearsal dinner, ceremony, and reception all in one place. Imagine a joyful sangeet night filled with music, a romantic mandap ceremony in a stunning s
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | etting, and a reception that turns into an unforgettable party. Each event is supported by Saint Kate's team, who ensure that every detail — from culinary excellence to artful ambiance — is executed with care. Celebrating Diversity with Style For South Asian weddings, Saint Kate is the perfect blend of tradition and modern luxury. The hotel’s team understands the richness of cultural celebrations and provides a backdrop where every custom — from vibrant mehndi nights to elegant receptions — is embraced and elevated. As a Certified Venue , Saint Kate has been recognized for its commitment to celebrating diversity and its ability to cater to the unique needs of South Asian weddings. From respecting age-old traditions to accommodating multi-day celebrations filled with color, music, and famil
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | y, the hotel is prepared to honor every detail that makes these weddings so extraordinary. Whether you’re planning a multi-day extravaganza or an intimate gathering, Saint Kate empowers you to design the celebration of your dreams. After all, the palette is yours to create. Begin your wedding masterpiece today at Saint Kate – The Arts Hotel , a Certified Venue that understands and celebrates South Asian traditions. STYLE GUIDE style Sponsored season color Venues: Saint Kate - The Arts Hotel | Planner: Blue Fancy Events | Photography: Christy Tyler Photography | Florals: Impressions by Esther | Caterer: Ashyana Events & Catering | Musician: Gurpreet “Smiley” Singh | Bakery: Simma's Bakery | DJ: Double Platinum DJ | Hair: Salon Rex | Makeup: MZJ Leon | Rental Decor: Bartique Bars Saint Kate
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | - The Arts Hotel is a member of the Platinum Guide. Love what you see? Explore their portfolios. COMMENT: FAVORITE: SHARE: TWEET: PIN: Tampa, FL Indian Wedding by Sona Photography October 2, 2025 Posted by: Shawna Comments Sujaya & Eric’s celebration had the kind of energy that makes strangers smile and aunties cry happy tears—often at the same time. Set against the palms and sparkling water of Hilton St. Pete Carillon Park , the weekend unfolded like a love letter to color: teal silks, fuchsia dupattas, citrus marigolds, and that Florida sunshine that insists on a close-up. Sona Photography turned every beat into a keepsake—crisp portraiture on the hotel’s grand drive, a j
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | oyful splash during the pre-wedding water ritual, tender close-ups where you can see the haldi glow and the heart eyes, and editorial frames under those chic, minimalist arches that had us whispering “print this one.” It’s the PG difference: seasoned pros who know South Asian timelines, capture traditions beautifully, and deliver magazine-ready galleries without missing a single candid. Eventfully Yours choreographed the flow with the calm of air-traffic control—baraat logistics, ceremony pacing, and reception transitions all landed right on time. Maharani Designs dressed the day in saturated blooms and thoughtful texture: a lush mandap tableau that felt intimate yet grand, petal-strewn aisles, and reception florals that echoed the bride’s palette without stealing the spotlight. Saree plea
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | ts fell just so thanks to Ruchi Patel’s expert draping, and Tampa Bay Henna’s intricate artistry wrapped the festivities in storytelling. Those symmetrical palms and hidden initials are the kind of details guests talk about over dessert. And speaking of glow, Michele Renee The Studio built looks that thrived in Florida light. Think soft-focus skin, defined eyes, and hair that held through laughter, dancing, and at least one enthusiastic group hug. It’s elegant, camera-literate glam that lasts from first look to last ladoo. FyerFly Productions kept the soundtrack irresistible, stacking classics with crowd-pleasers until the dance floor forgot what empty looked like. Publix delivered a sweet finish (Florida couples know), and the interfaith ceremony, lovingly led by Rabbi Lefkowitz and Guruj
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | i Marathe, wrapped everything in meaning—two faiths, one promise, and an aisle full of very proud people. We can’t stop replaying the highlights: the bridesmaids in coordinated jewel tones, a golden splash of water across mehndi-clad hands, the couple framed beneath a flower-laden canopy, a gallery-wall moment where Sujaya & Eric lean in and the whole world blurs, and that bridal twirl that says “yes, I picked the perfect bangles.” It’s joyful, elegant, and so them. Craving more? Dive into our daily features and save your favorite weddings to your planning board. Login with Facebook Submit a wedding REAL WEDDINGS WEDDING IDEAS FILMS CERTIFIED VENDORS VENDOR GUIDE GALLERY THE MAGAZINE Indian Wedding Vendors The complexity of Indian wedding ceremonies and celebrations makes assembling the right combination of vendors an absolute must! You want everything to go off without a hitch on your big day so you truly need to be able to rely on the best stylists, designers, caterers, DJs, mehndi artists, photographers, bartenders, you name it. It’s no easy feat coordinating all the services, contracts, and timelines for each and every vendor, even for the savviest Maharani bride, and that’s why we are here to he
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/indian-wedding-vendors | lp. Here, we are on a mission to help every bride make the fairytale wedding of her dreams come to life! Whether you are blending a fusion of cultures in an American Indian wedding or embracing a more traditional route sprinkled with myriad time-honored Indian wedding rituals, the Maharani Weddings' Platinum Guide is the premium resource for vendors in every category imaginable - from planning and design to cinematography, floral and decor, bridal fashion, hair and makeup, catering, and so much more. The top-rated vendors found in our guide are carefully selected for their experience with the many unique Indian wedding traditions and customs of South Asian culture. And unlike other wedding sites, we only feature a specially chosen group of indian wedding vendors who are pre-screened for th
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/indian-wedding-vendors | eir exemplary experience, service, and reputation with clients. In addition to soaking up all the glamorous and vibrant Indian wedding ideas and inspiration you can in our world-class Maharani Weddings’ Platinum Guide, you can also browse our exclusive list of vendors below. Simply filter your search by category, location, or both, and voilà! Login with Facebook Submit a wedding REAL WEDDINGS WEDDING IDEAS FILMS CERTIFIED VENDORS VENDOR GUIDE GALLERY THE MAGAZINE Certified Indian Wedding Vendors The complexity of Indian wedding ceremonies and celebrations makes assembling the right combination of vendors an absolute must! You want everything to go off without a hitch on your big day so you truly need to be able to rely on the best stylists, designers, caterers, DJs, mehndi artists, photographers, bartenders, you name it. It’s no easy feat coordinating all the services, contracts, and timelines for each and every vendor, even for the savviest Maharani bride, and that’s why we are
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/certified-indian-wedding-vendors | here to help. Here, we are on a mission to help every bride make the fairytale wedding of her dreams come to life! Whether you are blending a fusion of cultures in an American Indian wedding or embracing a more traditional route sprinkled with myriad time-honored Indian wedding rituals, the Maharani Weddings' Platinum Guide is the premium resource for vendors in every category imaginable - from planning and design to cinematography, floral and decor, bridal fashion, hair and makeup, catering, and so much more. The top-rated vendors found in our guide are carefully selected for their experience with the many unique Indian wedding traditions and customs of South Asian culture. And unlike other wedding sites, we only feature a specially chosen group of indian wedding vendors who are pre-scree
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/certified-indian-wedding-vendors | ned for their exemplary experience, service, and reputation with clients. In addition to soaking up all the glamorous and vibrant Indian wedding ideas and inspiration you can in our world-class Maharani Weddings’ Platinum Guide, you can also browse our exclusive list of vendors below. Simply filter your search by category, location, or both, and voilà!
